price: Wͻn a wͻagye adie na wͻdi dwuma pa no deε wͻbɛnya Soro Aheman no mu atena, εhͻ yε ahomegye bea, εnam dwumadi pa a wͻdieε no nti.
arabic: أَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ نُزُلَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti falahum jannātu al-mawā nuzulan bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
